xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the xinetd_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the xinetd_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the xinetd_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the xinetd_test.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the flags equals IPv4 IPv6.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the flags case insensitive equals ipv4 ipv6.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the flags matches the regular expression IPv4 Ipv.*.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the flags equals intercept.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

metadata.description: Make sure the flags entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the flags matches the regular expression intercep[a-z].
